title: Amount of products - 0.56g Fe + 30.0mL 1.00 M HCl

content.prompt: When a student adds 30.0 mL of 1.00 M HCl to 0.56 g of powdered Fe, a reaction occurs according to the equation above. When the reaction is complete at 273 K and 1.0 atm, which of the following is true?

choices.label: HCl is in excess, and 0.100 mol of HCl remains unreacted.
HCl is in excess, and 0.020 mol of HCl remains unreacted.
0.015 mol of FeCl2 has been produced.
0.22 L of H2 has been produced.

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
